docs.text: Digital Image Processing MATH6420P: Digital Image Processing (Autumn-Winter 2021-2022) Instructors : Ligang Liu Webpage : http://staff.ustc.edu.cn/~lgliu/Courses/DIP_2021_autumn-winter/default.htm Github Repository: https://github.com/Chaphlagical/DIP Slides Introduction PointProcessing PointProcessing(2)-Manifold ImageAsFunction(1)-Fitting Assignments Homework#1 Homework#2 Report Report#1 Report#2 Build Platform: Windows 10 Visual Studio 2019 CMake >=3.14.0 Setup OpenCV Download from official website: https://opencv.org/ Install OpenCV Add opencv-path/build/x64/vc15/bin to system path Create system variable: name: OpenCV_DIR value: opencv-path/build Clone project: git clone https://github.com/Chaphlagical/DIP --recursive Then, you can use CMake to build the project.
